com.baasbox.android

Class BaasUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.baasbox.android.BaasUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class BaasUser
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Represents a User of the BaasBox service.

    You can create a new instance through the factory method withUserName(String)

    Users have associated profile data with different levels of visibility as specified by BaasUser.Scope.

    Accounts on BaasBox are managed through this class signup(BaasHandler) login(String, BaasHandler) and logout(BaasHandler) family of methods, and their *sync counterpart.

    The currently logged in user can be retrieved through current(), and it is the only one that is modifiable.

    BaasUser also exposes methods to handle friendship, through follow(BaasHandler)/unfollow(BaasHandler) and direct gcm messaging throuhg send(com.baasbox.android.json.JsonObject, BaasHandler)

    In any other respect users are treated similarly to other resources exposed by the server.

    Created by Andrea Tortorella on 02/01/14.

      • getScope

        public JsonObject getScope(BaasUser.Scope scope)
        Returns data associate to this user for the specific scope as a JsonObject. If the data is not visible to the current logged in user returns null.

        The returned JsonObject should be treated as read-only unless the user to whom belongs is the current user as per isCurrent().

        Parameters:
        scope - a scope BaasUser.Scope not null
        Returns:
        JsonObject or null if the data is not visible.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if scope is null

      • getToken

        public java.lang.String getToken()
        Returns the authtoken used by this user. This will be non null only if the user is the current one.
        Returns:
        a String token

      • hasRole

        public boolean hasRole(java.lang.String role)
        Checks if the user has a specific role
        Parameters:
        role - a role name
        Returns:
        true if the user is known to belong to role
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if role is null

      • logout

        public RequestToken logout(BaasHandler<java.lang.Void> handler)
        Logouts the user from the server. After this call completes no current user is available. current() will return null.
        Parameters:
        handler - an handler to be invoked upon completion of the request
        Returns:
        a RequestToken to handle the async request

      • logout

        public RequestToken logout(java.lang.String registration,
                  BaasHandler<java.lang.Void> handler)
        Logouts the user from the specific device. After this call completes no current user is available. current() will return null. And on this device the user will not receive any new message from google cloud messaging.
        Parameters:
        registration - a registration id to remove
        handler - an handler to be invoked upon completion of the request
        Returns:
        a RequestToken to handle the async request

      • logout

        public RequestToken logout(java.lang.String registration,
                  Priority priority,
                  BaasHandler<java.lang.Void> handler)
        Logouts the user from the specific device. After this call completes no current user is available. current() will return null. And on this device the user will not receive any new message from google cloud messaging.
        Parameters:
        registration - a registration id to remove
        priority - a Priority
        handler - an handler to be invoked upon completion of the request
        Returns:
        a RequestToken to handle the async request

      • setPassword

        public BaasUser setPassword(java.lang.String password)
        Sets the password for this user. This should be called prior of any signup/login request, with a non null argument. Calling this with a null argument has the effect of erasing the password.
        Parameters:
        password - the password
        Returns:
        this user with the password set.
